BODY.NAME: Certificate II in Surface Extraction Operations
Certificate IV in Superannuation
BODY.SHORTDESCRIPTION: Certificate IV in Superannuation (ASFA 100) provides a comprehensive introduction to the Australian superannuationsystem for those with little or no knowledge.

BODY.NAME: Axcelerate Training Program
BODY.SHORTDESCRIPTION: The Academy Summer School starts in February and there has never been a better time to become an Accredited Wedding Planner.

BODY.NAME: Assertiveness Skills
BODY.SHORTDESCRIPTION: The key to effective human relating is maintaining respect in communication with others. Learning to act assertively is vital in gaining influence and developing successful relationships.

PARAMETERS.NAME: ID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the Course to filter.

PARAMETERS.NAME: searchTerm
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The term to use when filtering activities.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course type to return. w = workshop, p = accredited program, el = e-learning, all = All types.

PARAMETERS.NAME: offset
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - start at record.

PARAMETERS.NAME: displayLength
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - total records to retrieve.

PARAMETERS.NAME: sortColumn
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The column index to sort by.

PARAMETERS.NAME: current
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Current courses flag. True to show only current courses

PARAMETERS.NAME: public
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether to include public courses only. If false, returns all couse types regardless of public settings.

PARAMETERS.NAME: lastUpdated_min
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: In 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm' format. The course last updated date must be greater than or equal to this datetime. Courses last updated prior to Nov 2018 may not appear. Time is optional and in client's current timezone. Only applicable to w or p types.

PARAMETERS.NAME: lastUpdated_max
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: In 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm' format. The course last updated date must be less than or equal to this datetime. Courses last updated prior to Nov 2018 may not appear. Time is optional and in client's current timezone. Only applicable to w or p types.

PARAMETERS.NAME: isActive
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether to include active/inactive courses only. By default both will be included

DESCRIPTION: Returns a list of courses. Returns accredited, Non-accredited and e-learning courses seperately or returns all together
